a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Malaria deaths: IHME vs. WHO estimates, 2013
Median estimates of the annual number of deaths from malaria sourced from the IHME's Global Burden of Disease
(GBD) versus estimates published by the World Health Organization (WHO). Shown is a line of parity; if estimates
between IHME and WHO data matched, points would lie along this line.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (GBD); WHO Global Health Observatory
